Exaggerate: The claim made by Trump exaggerates the number of women who accused him and the amount of money they were paid.
Lack enough support: There is no evidence provided to support the claim that the women were paid to make up stories about Trump.
Problematic assumption: Trump assumes that because he has had false charges made against him, the allegations against Kavanaugh must also be false.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that at least 18 women have accused Trump of sexual misconduct.
Understate: None of the biases selected fall under understatement.
Falters at times: None of the biases selected fall under faltering at times.
Exist alternative explanation: None of the biases selected fall under alternative explanations.
